tool_description: Creates complete MARC21 bibliographic records from descriptive metadata elements, following current cataloging standards and best practices for library systems.

physical_description.description: Physical extent, dimensions, and format details

subject_headings.description: Array of Library of Congress Subject Headings

isbn_issn.description: ISBN, ISSN, or other standard identifier

material_type.description: Resource type: book, serial, map, music, visual, electronic, mixed

encoding_level.description: MARC encoding level: full, less-than-full, abbreviated, core

cataloging_source.description: Institution or agency code for cataloging source

error_messages: Missing required title: Title field cannot be empty for MARC record creation
Invalid material type: Use book, serial, map, music, visual, electronic, or mixed
Invalid encoding level: Use full, less-than-full, abbreviated, or core
Malformed publication info: Check date and publisher format requirements
Invalid subject heading format: Ensure subject headings follow LCSH format
Classification number format error: Verify DDC or LCC number format
Invalid identifier format: Check ISBN/ISSN format and checksum
usage: Provide title as minimum requirement. Add creator, publication_info, subject_headings, and other elements for comprehensive records. Specify material_type for appropriate MARC format, encoding_level for detail level, and cataloging_source for provenance.

marc_record.description: Complete MARC21 record in ISO 2709 format

marc_xml.description: MARC record in XML format for system compatibility

control_number.description: Generated control number for the record

record_status.description: Status of record creation and any quality indicators

field_count.description: Total number of MARC fields in the completed record
